data.comment: The match is underway. Internacional have kicked-off.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Porto Alegre.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Coritiba are coming forward and Robson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 5, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Internacional a goal kick.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 9, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 12, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodolfo (Coritiba) has received a yellow card from Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Internacional close to the penalty box.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
In Porto Alegre, Rodrigo Lindoso (Internacional) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Ricardo Oliveira (Coritiba) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
In the minute 21, Patrick (Internacional) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
The match at Estadio Beira-Rio has been interrupted briefly for a check on Wilson, who is down injured.
In the minute 23, Wilson is back on his feet again.
Coritiba needs to be cautious. Internacional have an attacking throw-in.
Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Coritiba's half?
In the minute 25, Internacional pushes forward through Abel Hernandez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Internacional.
Giovanni Augusto (Coritiba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 27, Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Internacional.
Internacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Internacional.
In Porto Alegre Internacional drive forward through Marcos Guilherme. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 31, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Beira-Rio.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Internacional's Yuri Alberto scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Heitor to set up the goal.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 37, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Coritiba throw-in in Internacional's half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Internacional's area.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 39, Free kick Internacional.
Free kick in a good position for Coritiba!
Giovanni (Coritiba) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Internacional's area.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Beira-Rio the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Porto Alegre - Coritiba with the kick-off.
At Estadio Beira-Rio, Coritiba are penalized for being offside.
Giovanni Augusto is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 48, Neilton instrumental with a fine assist.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Coritiba throw-in in Internacional's half.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Coritiba.
Heitor (Internacional) sees red and is sent off in Porto Alegre!
In the minute 55, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Internacional a goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodinei is on a sub for Yuri Alberto for Internacional.
In the minute 56, The home team have replaced Marcos Guilherme with Nonato. This is the second substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
Coritiba are pushing forward but Robson's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
In the minute 57, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Internacional drive upfield and Patrick gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Nonato scores to make it 2-1 at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 63, Internacional to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
In Porto Alegre Coritiba's Neilton is caught offside.
In the minute 66, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Internacional.
Internacional are on the attack at Estadio Beira-Rio, where Patrick is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, In Porto Alegre Internacional attack through Abel Hernandez. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 72, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Jorginho (Coritiba) is making a first substitution, with Nathan replacing Neilton.
In the minute 74, Goal! Sabino (Coritiba) levels the score at 2-2 with a header in Porto Alegre.
Giovanni Augusto with an assist there.
Yan Sasse is replacing Mattheus for Coritiba at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 75, Coritiba make their third substitution with Henrique Vermudt replacing Rodolfo.
Throw-in high up the field for Coritiba in Porto Alegre.
Coritiba drives forward and Ricardo Oliveira gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Coritiba.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 81, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Victor Cuesta (Internacional) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The away team replace Ricardo Oliveira with Rodrigo Muniz.
At Estadio Beira-Rio, Yan Sasse for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In the minute 83, Rodrigo Muniz is booked for the away team.
Eduardo Coudet is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Damian Musto replacing Rodrigo Lindoso.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Coritiba.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Patrick (Internacional) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 88, Ramon Martinez is replacing Giovanni Augusto for the away team.
Important block from the Coritiba defence as Edenilson fires in a strike for Internacional.
Throw-in for Internacional close to the penalty box.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Coritiba's Matheus Sales gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Coritiba throw-in in Internacional's half.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Coritiba's Sabino attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in Coritiba.
Free kick Coritiba.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
At Estadio Beira-Rio, Damian Musto has been yellow-carded for the home team.
